Windlord:: 

Windlord heard's Nightlight's call of help and a personal battle 
started inside his spark.

"What could I do?????" he thought "The enemy is in front of me and an 
enemy are attacking my friends... In one side my honor tells me stay 
here and in other calls me to fight... They aren't my allies but I 
can't leave them until this battle end but if I don't go my friends 
could die... How can I help maximals and help my friends at time? 
Maximals didn't me alone while those blood-thirsy guys were hunt me, 
but Preplex, land mine and others are a group... Whatever I choose, I 
loose... What can I do??????"
